ModMetaData.name: Feed The Colonists
ModMetaData.author: PostRobcore
ModMetaData.description:
v1.2 for Version 1.1!

Allows making four stacks of pemmican or kibble. Skill and ingredient requirement is the same, output is 4x default, and the work requirement is 3.5x default.

My mod got eaten by the Core game! Bulk meals are now in the Core game, so techincally this mod feeds colonists and animals in equal amounts.
